## passThroughAdapter variable

A ready-to-use adapter object that returns the source URL unmodified.

**Signature:**

```typescript
passThroughAdapter: Adapter;
```

## Remarks

It can be used as a fallback in `onMissingAdapter`<!-- -->. If used with `registerAdapters()`<!-- -->, it MUST be registered last.

## Example 1

Recommended: Using with `onMissingAdapter`

```ts
defineConfig({
  onMissingAdapter: (url) => {
    if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development') {
      throw new Error(`Adapter not found for URL: ${url}`);
    }
    return passThroughAdapter;
  },
});
```

## Example 2

Alternative: Using with `registerAdapters` - Ensure correct order

```ts
import {registerAdapters, passThroughAdapter} from '@yoot/yoot';
import {shopifyAdapter} from '@yoot/shopify';

registerAdapters(shopifyAdapter, passThroughAdapter); // passThroughAdapter must be last
```
